Augusta-Richmond_County.Doctors Hospital (Augusta, Georgia):
Doctors Hospital is a 350-bed full-service tertiary care center located in Augusta, Georgia.


== Facilities ==
The facilities on the Doctors Hospital campus include:


=== Joseph M. Still Burn Center ===
The Joseph M. Still Burn Center is the largest medical burn facility in the United States. Located in Augusta, Georgia (United States), it is part of the Doctors Hospital campus, and serves as a primary burn care center for the Southeastern United States.
